name: Maze Blaze!
description:
Maze Blaze is a brand spanking new game! Blast your way around each of the levels in a race against time. There will be many challenges to overcome and trick shots to be made to make it through them. All the while, enjoying the beauty of the massive array of color in the game.

🥇 Beat your high-score. Play the endless runner mode and see how many stars you can collect before the inevitable happens!

🎨 A game made out colors. Everything in the game will continuously change color to create a unique look each and every time you play!

⭐️ Multiple levels to complete that can be played in short bursts that provide ever increasing difficult challenges.

💥 You will be progressively chased by the laser that wants to crush your hope of making it through to the next level. Once you start, there's no going back without being evaporated!
